roundup.title: Roundup Quote
roundup.description: Get a quote for Roundup litigation, linked to non-Hodgkin's lymphoma and other cancers caused by glyphosate.

paraquat.title: Paraquat Quote
paraquat.description: Get a quote for Paraquat litigation, involving manufacturers like Syngenta, Chevron, and FMC.

afff.description: Get a quote for AFFF litigation, involving toxic PFAS 'forever chemicals' in firefighting foam.

personal-injury.description: Get a quote for personal injury claims due to negligence or misconduct.

depo-provera.title: Depo Provera Quote
depo-provera.description: Get a quote for Depo Provera litigation, alleging meningiomas from Pfizer's contraceptive.

nec-baby-formula.title: NEC Baby Formula Quote
nec-baby-formula.description: Get a quote for NEC baby formula litigation, involving manufacturers like Abbott and Mead Johnson.
